CustomField.formula: If(Contains(Description__c, "BW"), "BW", If(Contains(Description__c, "SOLID"), "SOLID", If(Contains(Description__c, "SANDED"), "SANDED", If(Contains(Description__c, "ASPEN"), "ASPEN", If(Contains(Description__c, "PEBBLE"), "PEBBLE", If(Contains(Description__c, "METALLIC"), "METALLIC", If(Contains(Description__c, "QUARRY"), "QUARRY", If(Contains(Description__c, "EARTHEN"), "EARTHEN", If(Contains(Description__c, "MOSAIC"), "MOSAIC", If(Contains(Description__c, "TEMPEST"), "TEMPEST", If(Contains(Description__c, "SUPREME"), "SUPREME", "")))))))))))
CustomField.label: DDP Category
